isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - STOP LIGHT SWITCH

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The stop light switch ( Figure 5 ) is an electro-pneumatic switch which operates in conjunction with the brake valve and stop lights by completing the electrical circuit when a brake application of 5 psi or more is made.

Tractors have one switch located on the tractor protection valve. On trucks, both the primary and secondary brake systems are equipped with a stop light switch. If a failure should occur in either system, the system that continues to function will provide stop lights when the brakes are applied.
